currentProject.name: LaunchDirectories.com
currentProject.description: LaunchDirectories is a curated platform listing 80+ startup launch directories, providing key SEO metrics to help founders find the best places to submit their startups. It also offers a paid service to handle submissions, saving time and boosting startup visibility.
